title: A Place to Cheer You Up
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Emma? Hey Emma<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah, what is it, Karin-chan? I’m sorry, I was spacing out there for a little bit....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>How unusual of you. What’s the matter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s nothing much, but.... I just happened to wonder how Neve-chan is doing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s your pet goat back home, right. Maybe you’re homesick? You don’t have to push yourself, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh? I’m not pushing myself or anything. I just randomly thought of her<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hmm.... Hey, what if we go to the zoo next holiday? You can touch the goats and guinea pigs there. There’s also a panda. A panda! I’m sure seeing the panda will cheer you up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, isn’t that just you wanting to meet Panda-san, Karin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh? It’s not like-.... No, maybe it is like that.... Aaah, I’m no good. I kept immediately thinking about myself....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I like that side of you too, Karin-chan. Let’s touch the goats and guinea pigs, and go see panda-san too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
